tool_description: What really matters about cryptocurrency today
name: Latest Crypto articles
title: Latest Crypto articles

api_list.name: Get Crypto news from a specific source
api_list.description: This endpoint wil provide you daily Crypto news from a specific source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://latest-crypto-articles.p.rapidapi.com/news/cointelegraph"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "latest-crypto-articles.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://latest-crypto-articles.p.rapidapi.com/news/{sourceid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "latest-crypto-articles.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Crypto news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Cryptocurrency from all over the world
